homepage.title: Don't wait. Get the parts for your car now.
homepage.subtitle: Tell us what you need and we will find it for you.
homepage.availability: Currently available only in the United Arab Emirates.

benefit1.title: Create Requests in a Matter of Seconds
benefit1.description: Streamline your search - with just a few clicks, make your car part request and watch the responses flow in.

benefit2.title: Pricing That Fits
benefit2.description: Obtain quotes from multiple car part vendors offering competitive and affordable rates and choose the perfect fit for your wallet.

benefit3.title: Every Order Delivered to Your Doorstep
benefit3.description: Our reliable shipping ensures your ordered auto parts arrive promptly and safely, saving you time and hassle.

step1.title: Create a part request
step1.description: Send your request to our network of second-hand auto parts vendors.

step2.title: Receive offers
step2.description: Get responses from multiple vendors each at competitive prices.

step3.title: Pick the best option
step3.description: Analyze and choose the best offer that suits your needs.

step4.title: Place your order
step4.description: Place your order and have the car part safely delivered right to your doorstep.

callToAction.text: Create a request and receive the price for one part or many in minutes. Currently only in the United Arab Emirates.

partnerSection.title: Want to partner with us?
partnerSection.description: If you are a second-hand auto parts vendor in the UAE interested in partnering with us to offer your parts to our customers, please fill out the form below and we will reach out to you.
